title: 343 - Ring My Bell
description:
In this episode, the guys converse about executing on instead telling someone about the principles you believe in. 

Intro - Conversation about recent flight adventures and preferences. 

“If a dream has been placed in your heart, You Owe You to see that dream to fruition!” Preorder your copy today! https://etinspires.com/you-owe-you 

36:15 - “Don’t become more adamant about ideology of beliefs versus actually doing it.” Focus more on staying true to what you say and believe in! Execute more instead of giving a false perceptive of how you truly live. 

43:20 - “The formula that worked for you may not work for someone else.” 

47:10 - “Put more emphasis on what you actually believe in with actions.“

Takeaways
You have the power of choice. 

Your life should be attractive enough for people wanting to follow. 

Listener Perks


Organifi Is giving our listeners up to 20% off of their order! Just go to www.organifi.com/success. Support your journey from sunrise to sunset with fan-favorite superfoods backed by science to replenish micronutrients, support energy and balance hormones from am to pm with our customer favorites.

You can earn up to an additional FIVE HUNDRED DOLLAR CREDIT by conducting virtual interviews! Go to Indeed.com/SUCCESS to claim your SEVENTY-FIVE DOLLAR CREDIT NOW.
